divs: Sighting Detailslooking out of the front of my house, saw a bright object come towar my house, it was moving. I went to my window in the back of the house, It was on the leftside and flying treetop level. no noise. top was a bright white, on bottom, red, blue and green flashing lights. when it came over my house it had shiffed direction.no noise.
Summary: saw a bright object come over my house, no noise and flashing lighrts.
